channel.title: How to make your character turn towards the clicked object
channel.description:
I want my character to turn towards the object just clicked. In this case the object ID is 2213 aka a Fishing Spot
Would it be something like this?: [code] TurnPlayerTo(UsedOnX, UsedOnY);[/code]

item.title: How to make your character turn towards the clicked object
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); TurnPlayerTo(UsedOnX, UsedOnY);
Thats what I got and it works

Read full topic
item.source: How to make your character turn towards the clicked object
